directions: Heat a soup pot over medium heat. Add oil. When oil is hot, add onion. Saute onions 5 minutes. Add broth, tomatoes, black beans and pumpkin puree. Stir to combine ingredients and bring soup to a boil. Reduce heat to medium low and stir in cream, curry, cumin, cayenne and salt, to taste. Simmer 5 minutes, adjust seasonings and serve garnished with chopped chives.
ingredients: 2 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, 1 turn of the pan
3 cups canned or packaged vegetable stock, found on soup aisle
One 14 1/2-ounce can diced tomatoes in juice
Two 15-ounce cans pumpkin puree (found often on the baking aisle)
1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, eyeball it in the palm of your hand
20 blades fresh chives, chopped or snipped, for garnish
title: Pumpkin and Black Bean Soup
